# Structured Literature Review for Universal and Lighweight Cloud-Edge Orchestration 

## Required Libraries

```{r}
if(!require(kableExtra)){
    install.packages("kableExtra")
    library(kableExtra)
}
if(!require(tidyverse)){
    install.packages("tidyverse")
    library(tidyverse)
}
```

## Mapping of Values

```{r}
replaceValue <- function(letter) {
  switch(letter,
         y = "\\\\ding{51}",
         x = "\\\\ding{55}",
         "#" = "\\\\#",
         "~" = "\\\\ding{109}",
         "*" = "\\ding{82}"
         )
}
```

## Read the csv

```{r}
nodes <- read.csv2("csv/nodes.csv")
```

## Modify Values in Columns

```{r warning=FALSE}
nodes.mutated <- nodes %>% 
  mutate_at(c("CPU", "Memory", "Storage"), funs(gsub('#', replaceValue("#"),. , fixed = FALSE))) %>% 
  mutate_at(c("C","F","E","G","CPU","Memory","Storage"), funs(gsub('y', replaceValue("y"),. ,fixed=FALSE))) %>% 
  mutate_at(c("CPU", "Memory", "Storage"), funs(gsub('~', replaceValue("~"),. , fixed = FALSE))) %>% 
  mutate_at(c("C","F","E","G","CPU","Memory","Storage"), funs(gsub('x', replaceValue("x"),. ,fixed=FALSE))) %>% 
  mutate_at(c("C","F","E","G"), funs(gsub('*', replaceValue("*"),. ,fixed=TRUE)))
```

## Export as LaTeX Table

```{r}
nodes.mutated.kbl <- kbl(nodes.mutated, "latex", escape = FALSE, caption="Test", booktabs = TRUE) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options="scale_down") %>%
  footnote(., general=c("C: Cloud, F: Fog, E: Edge, G: Gateway"), general_title = "")

save_kable(nodes.mutated.kbl, "latex/nodes.tex")
```
